categories: Category:Sith in the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: Pallima was a male Human who served the Lost Tribe of Sith as a High Lord, during the time of the Mandalorian Wars. In 3960 BBY, Pallima was the leader of the Gold Faction.

Pallima attended a rake-riding event in the city Tahv on the planet Kesh, and he was decapitated by Flen and Sawj Luzo, along with Dernas, the leader of the rival Red Faction, after the uvak wrangler Campion Dey staged an attack on Grand Lord Lillia Venn.
